description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns indicative of potential malfunctions and proactively suggests maintenance interventions. This scenario focuses on the normal operational workflow.
initial_goal: Minimize equipment downtime in the semiconductor fabrication plant by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on real-time sensor data analysis.
constraints: maintenance_window_constraints: must adhere to scheduled maintenance periods
model_update_frequency: daily retraining with new data
